topic.title: How much do .bit domains cost at the momment?

1_1DHp9XeGd9EU3nm7h3Uf7BvxxiQsRUjmdJ.body: Your wife is clearly a liar and was seeing another man. She needed an easy way out and set you up.

2_1DFDjUGJdSp1kMuFq1AtNS9ZWmkVtbp947.body: Google analytics may work via a public proxy, but you are only publicly announcing that you are a ZN user via your analytics ID. It's an interesting idea however. Please write a blog about it.
